MGd3sE9jDLh3Ol5GZ-N7fw.text: Love, love, love. Had my first experience here today. Used to get bubble tea alot in California and haven't had one since 2005. I'm super excited Quickly is here in Charlotte. Will definitely recommend and will be back lots.

7li16ky6H5C0sv26_kr5-w.text: So excited to have a Quickly open up in Charlotte! The place is a little spartan, but the folks who run it are wonderfully friendly. It's that Quickly bubble tea you know and love, so I wish them all the best and hope others find this place!

Zbs_5GpboxP-F59mBGIyIA.text: Not impressed at all. The taro bubble tea taste powdery, I understand it is made with powered taro but it was super grainy. The bobas were hard and just not good, taste like old bobas that's been sitting around. Not worth it at all. If you like your teas you get from other oriental places that you do in CLT then stick with those places and so you won't be disappointed like me. The next weekend I had to go to Super G mart and for the milk tea I always do from the Hong Kong place inside the store, I'm never disappointed there.

p2RKWQyGXGbYGpWHPUiKFw.text: One of the best costumer service ever experienced! the lady was sooo nice with everything! Not to mention their awesome variety of flavors and jellies! for a great price! Even though it's not at a popular location I still highly recommend!

FoIdElE4vrbl3QW65LqzZQ.text: The food and bubble tea are good, but not good enough for the recent price increases. Won't be visiting again.

U8gz51BjSi8HtwjWNDhP2A.text: Finally went to Quickly's today and I love the Banana and Strawberry Slush! The slush drinks are great for the summer weather and the bubbles balls are really surprising and refreshing. About 90% disappointed they didn't have any of the rice bowls listed on Quickly's online menu.

3wa9MCshOw2gfZZgFeF-sg.text: One of the best I've had! When I'm in Charlotte I know where to go for a good bubble tea now! I got the mango pineapple snow and it was good it didn't have like a powder aftertaste like other places I've tried before. The owner was nice and she gave me a good recommendation for the flavors. I'm more of the Thai Tea type but I decided to try something different and Quickly didn't disappoint!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. so many choices!!
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. food menu

dUDMENlzm9dKtzzCsZBGxA.text: I got the Thai milk tea  with boba and it was decent. Nothing amazing but for the convenience of not having to drive all the way to Super G Mart I gave this place 3 stars. My hubby got the strawberry banana...for the price they could have at least used a slice of real fruit lol! The strawberry banana liquid almost looked translucent lmao! That is one flavor we'll cross of the list. I will give this place another try once I feel like they are more established...by then hopefully things are better.

bRLofqGBuUkGnybRk0Q-RA.text: Their flavors are really good ! Good place for drinks .. Cool place to bring anyone to just snack on their little appetizers . Yummy popcorn chicken !

mVGaNzlxxdMjHYtD0SBCCg.text: BEST QUICK STOP in the University Area! You can get a refreshing bubble tea along with some nice snacks if your hungry! Super affordable and quick!

g2hQ-CNWiIlpQHKbwyRjZw.text: This place is so awesome. It's a chain in other countries, but it's the only one here. They have tons of flavors and more add-ins than I've seen anywhere else!

CBMgLh93lsw8YcgQ0OP5Gg.text: Great Boba tea in Charlotte. Lots of favors and toppings. The "real deal". Includes slush, snow, flavored, rose and milk. Quick service too.

sd0CaKH7MAXR87Z0kxdolw.text: We decided to go here again and it is much improved. The boba was pretty good. It was chewy and not hard. The milk tea was really good and flavorful. The slush was also very good. I would recommend to go here for boba tea.

UwMAGFKxcEr_qUQbE94aQQ.text: I discovered this place not too long ago AND I LOVE IT! No lies, this is the best bubble tea Ive ever had, and now, I am a regular customer.  The place is cute, colorful, humble. Too many options from flavors to toppings. I always get the Avocado bubble tea with pearls and egg pudding (flan, which is so good btw)  The lady behind the register is so helpful, nice, and smiling! I love her!  I honestly dont see how people can be giving this business less than 4 stars... It deserves 5 stars all the way.

v8OqXjgA6AcP8qtNBYyhBg.text: Great selection of flavors. About 25min from downtown Charlotte. Great find! Generous with the Boba, which is always a plus!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Honeydew flavor, but our second was honeydew/hazelnut.... delicious.

DXYO7HRco7ERf3x5N1Pw6A.text: Great Slush drinks! I have been addicted every since I tried them.  Place is clean and employees are very nice. The popcorn chicken and popcorn shimp are great! Unbelievably light and crispy and truly reminded me of popcorn with its lightness. Tried the milk tea but wasn't what I expected and was very powdery.  But haven't gone wrong yet with the slush and snow.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yummy with a variety of add ins if you are feeling adventurous.

7kkgKta7Qzjapdg9RCZE-A.text: I like this place. It reminds me of the bubble tea shops in southern Ca. There are so many varieties in teas and toppings to add to your drink. The egg puffs was perfectly sweeten and a great treat with my milk green tea with boba. The owners were helpful with their suggestions. I look forward to going back to try other items.

-xxVPC6fn96Egyy8HTxxmw.text: This place is great! It's pretty new but they've got their flavors and boba down! I literally had to visit two days in a row it was so good. I got the milk Thai tea with bubbles both times and I would highly recommend it.   They have snow flavors which is like a slushy and they also have rose flavors and milk flavors rose  are not creamy like the milk based flavors. Tons of flavor options for all and tons of size options. There's really something for everyone here. Staff is also super friendly and helpful.

jW9iSyrEuM62Supaa58HPA.text: This place is a gem ! I loved it , I order the red bean flavor and it was heavenly, it's mostly drinks and a few snacks but the drinks are to die for, they just have 3 weeks on business so maybe later on they can add more things to the menu. I definitely will go again! If you are reading this in not to late to try it!! Lol

WQdn8NlVvKbEAhB7IXLxvg.text: So I tried Quickly today and was not impressed with their bubble tea or milk tea. My coconut boba was not sweet. It has a pretty watered down coconut taste. My coconut milk tea did not taste like coconut at all. In fact, it taste like Thai Tea. Booooooooo! We got an egg roll too, but it was expensive. $1.50 for a single egg roll. Not worth it and only had to get it because there's was a $10 limit to use debt/credit card or it'll charge you a fee.  By the way, bubble teas are about $4.25 each.  Since it just opened, I will give it another try down the road. For now, that's my opinion. Will give an updated review once I go back in a few weeks/months.

6imcCvOC3rV-PktgWpZtNg.text: I'm from San Diego and we have TONS of Boba places here so when I visited, I had to take my friend and introduce him to one of my favorite drinks! I got the taro tea with boba in their souvenir Quickly mason jar. It came with a lid. My friend got coffee with added caramel & boba. They were both delicious! Service was quick and the woman was very helpful.

7wQL_bOjXp_X5MHZ1I__pg.text: Legit boba shop! Hard to find these places around these parts. Glad to have one. Many outlets, nice clean shop, and good wifi.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

G2ZUYLwzIkZn7t9EC_sVjA.text: I love this place! I got a large peach milk tea with small pearls and strawberry Boba. It was delicious and didn't have a strange aftertaste or stale pearls like so many other Boba places I've tried. They also give a 10% discount for students similar to other places in the area. I will keep coming back.

MPoJD0O6UZZhw0jzF0sk4w.text: What a sweet surprise for me & my mom to have stumbled upon them. I was impressed  that they have 5 different drink versions of each flavor you choose & then you can put up to 3 toppings in them, so fun! The mango smoothie was delishhh & I liked it better with them oh so very soft & flavorful jellys, I loved the strawberry & coconut ones. The milk options are interesting, I think the red beans which is a classic Asian dessert (the OGs always love) pairs better with that. Wow the options seem endless & they are worth coming back for. Exciting plus to have been shocked to find out the owners are fellow Cambodians like my family!! The mom & son are superb!!! Very sweet, kind,  patient, happy & helpful!! Please come support them and put together your genius combinations of yumminess! Honestly if you don't like yours, I bet you just didn't put the right stuff together, so try again, practice makes perfect! They came all the way from Philly! Thank you for being here!! Oh yeah & we had the chicken egg rolls (the 4 pc not 5) which we thought were surprisingly long and good, comes with sweet chili sauce. My mom loved the dumplings, filled real nice and full.

62Tc7rLkZKCod1HqysIrXg.text: Love this spot one of the many amazing places by the uncc area i love this place in particular because that have amazing potstickers and popcorn chicken i really really like this place

b95Z598gQyVbaWVGJ1Lz1Q.text: I really like their tea, its authentic asian bubble tea, however, it's a bit pricey.

_kjMHCeWCNu38zcILkPLhA.text: Great service. The owner was really friendly and teas are yummy. The only quickly that you can find in Charlotte. Glad that we decided to come here and try it out.

tUhPwyEMEb1mh8Db0Y9zgw.text: Had this place plenty of times and have tried other places too like tea fusion cafe. The taro here tastes way better than the one at tea fusion, theirs are too icy where here at quickly's it's way smoother and has more taro taste. The prices here are also very affordable because of the free 3 toppings. Also the people that works here are so very kind and helpful.

8jF9DMslDI-uJdiFfm51PQ.text: Great service and love the coffee milk tea ! They have many different sizes and lots of snack options. Service is very fast

5aCVsz2UdXSbY8FUqPnsuA.text: I love this place ! There so clean and have lots of teas to offer I drive over 30 mins to go here when I'm craving bubble tea . There super friendly and have great selection

nfuJ8WfYSQ2_kfqG16O68g.text: We've been to a lot of Quickly in California. We've been waiting for one to open up. Great place to get some bubble tea. Friendly staff. Good tasting boba!

RPRNOpg4RRdb2_oDqSHp_g.text: This is one of my favorite places to get milk tea in Charlotte. The owner is very nice and the place is very clean. I would recommend getting the black tea milk tea when you come. You also get to choose up to 3 different toppings. I always get the egg pudding, grass jelly, and boba pearls in my drink. And best of all is they always give discounts to students if you have your school ID with you.

bSUEoacxuVWaNLdkPxhhIg.text: Super friendly service, great drinks, amazing food. I can hangout or even study here.

Qo0MpgQ7xjY7laVwiwrBNQ.text: This is by far my favorite bubble tea spot! I am "Quikly" drinking my way through the whole menu! The woman that I assume to be the owner since she is here day and night any day I swing by, is so sweet and makes great suggestions when I'm indecisive. The food is also on point. I had the veggie egg rolls today (more like spring rolls) and the pot stickers. Both came out piping hot and tasted sooo good. I can't wait for my next visit!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Every flavor is amazing!

G4nflGot_SAf2Cced5nrXA.text: We are huge fans of Taro and have had from the very best to the very worst! Quickly ranks among the worse. Their Taro resembles a slushy instead of a Smoothie. The Taro taste very powdery and not authentic at all. The Lychee slushy wasn't much better but better than the Taro.   The "egg buns" caught my attention but quickly disappointed me when I realized it's just a freaking waffle with no syrup.   I haven't found a good Boba spot yet but I'm still hopeful. Skip this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. &#34;Egg buns&#34; aka WAFFLES!!!! Don&#39;t bother
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Not impressed, their Taro is powdered and too slushy.

c46OEP2SVauKB2xmDAapmg.text: Wow! This place is amazing! Since moving to North Carolina, I have been frantically searching for a good boba spot and we finally found one! Go here for your boba needs!

_tvzifgfM5KVUK7jwXe8gw.text: I've been coming to Quickly for over a year and I love it. Their boba is always good and the workers are very kind.

ro34p56O9_uPC75LZGkTkg.text: I'm extremely disappointed at this place. I once ordered two drinks from them through door dash. When the delivery arrived I noticed there was only one drink so proceeded to call them and once they answered my call, they refused to reimburse my money for a drink they NEVER made for me. That is absolute nonsense. How can you charge somebody for nothing and not return them their money? I feel robbed!!

m2J5JaQDH-bCgw694BOgZQ.text: Fast, friendly, clean and deeeeelish! Green milk tea with honey boba--yes! Coconut milk tea with pineapple jelly-- hell yes! Potstickers made fresh and served hot. We will definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

AOzRpQV2ol4zY75UJ8yU6A.text: OMG! This is SO good and the atmosphere just adds to it. If you want to relax & grab a tasty snack & the most awesome boba tea I've ever had, this is your spot

wMjbzPJL_MGAornucNx8Dg.text: We enjoyed our experience here! We hadn't been to a bubble tea place since we moved. Their menu is so big it can be a bit overwhelming but the cashier walked us through it and we made our order of 7 teas and it was under $30! Excellent service, it was delicious! Definitely going back to try new combinations!

NDjxjl7y0e9W0z_LNoUTLA.text: My husband and I are so addicted to this place it's unreal.  Everything we've tried has been good and the lady that works at the cash register is so friendly and nice.

7ia-t7gXQcdi9OVyFQlbQg.text: Wasn't even able to get boba because we were denied access with a Working Service Dog. It doesn't matter what your owner/manager says. ITS THE LAW and illegal to deny a customer for whatever reason despite the health code.  My husband even kindly explained what a service dog is to the lady and that she is needed for medical reasons but she said "sorry I don't understand"  and continued to refuse us service so we took our business to Tea Fusion where they gladly accepted our orders.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. She was not wearing her vest because it&#39;s not required by I was wearing my leash wrap that clearly says &#34;SERVICE DOG&#34;

kSjxaEKSBF77O2MVrvJbeg.text: Love their taro milk tea. Great service  and alot of other flavors tea. The place is clean. They have snacks as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

CyfsV42C-Lw2W-4PLPpOKA.text: They've got some really good Jasmine milk tea. The couple there are so sweet. You HAVE to try out the green tea waffle and original waffle as well!! I will surely come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

NsOW9rNM52RsrbFsNDGXwA.text: Finally. A Quickly opened in Charlotte. If you have no idea what bubble tea is, then I would suggest you to come here and try it. I think that there have been some boba shops come through Charlotte, but never lasting. I hope this one stays, but wished that it was closer to home. I can't complain.  Pretty standard boba, would definitely come through and just try bubble tea in general. Quickly isn't the best ever boba ever, but it's still boba. I had the black milk tea, but the only problem with Quickly is that you can't change their sugar levels and all of that. It's basically what you order is what you get. The drink had a pretty high level of sugar, but it's alright. Look, Quickly isn't the best, but it's still bubble tea and I'm definitely a fan considering Charlotte has always lacked bubble tea shops. Until more shops open, this one will be a go to if I ever have a bubble tea itch and I'm in town.

kOcS7euFl1xC47l5t0rRCQ.text: Wow!! What a selection they have. I've been to other places and they usually have only a couple of flavors but this location has just about every flavor you could imagine. My favorite is the Green Mango. Awesome combo or sweet and a little sour. Popcorn chicken is legit also. Definitely recommended!!

CvVvFancJ8hw0bCHJX9eXw.text: Love the bubble tea and how they deliver  their tea . Delivery was Ontime. For an xlarge tea definitely less jelly/bubbles than other locations (hence the 4*).

DDtuLfGY5p63Vm6HND5QTw.text: Snuck in for a bubble tea. I like the original milk tea with plan boba, so that's what I ordered and it was made just the way it's suppose to be.   They have TONS of different flavors, and each are able to be ordered 3-4 different ways. Also lots of different goodies you can add on top of the traditional boba.   Also tried their HK style waffles. Nice hot snack that's light on sweetness. Goes really well with a drink when you're not really hungry.   Super colorful inside. Super! Very clean.. and did I mention that it was colorful?  Service was prompt and friendly. Cool little place.

lQIe2JHs2gDWbVZJYlLJoQ.text: After coming here a second time, I can say that I'm a fan! The people that work here appear to have a passion for the food and beverage they serve. I love that! I came here a little early looking to grab a quick lunch, being totally unaware that they open at noon, and a kind lady that works there opened the doors early for me. She was very nice and helped me choose the perfect boba tea. I tried the popcorn chicken as well  and it was pretty spot on. I still think the prices a little bit higher than they should be, but who am I to complain when the product is good lol!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Thai Milk Tea with honey boba...so good!

39Prz7ttuvLNqLIZMUZe0A.text: First time at Quickly - really nice staff, very helpful with offering suggestions. Good snow green tea boba.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yums

WqXmaBXS3dTrn9E8rd_nqg.text: One of my favorite places to go for some really good bubble tea didn't find out about this place until like last year. Every time that I have gone, it's always such great service and doesn't take any longer than maybe 5 minutes!

VlaLOrqR8lS0ISxYx05gjQ.text: I adore bubble tea, and when I moved from NJ to NC, I didn't think I'd be having it much ever again. My fiance and I were going to a cheap froyo place for a while just to get our fix but it closed. Enter Quickly. I'd been around the area for a while yet somehow never knew about it until a Google search! We were pleasantly surprised (and at first overwhelmed) by all the options!! I haven't had one that I didn't like so far...the lady who works here let us have a few free samples of different teas/flavors so we could see the difference. I can't imagine anyone having a poor experience with the bubble tea here unless you don't know what you're getting into in the first place. :)

Y7ydK1Vr4IjboDcT4HdsMQ.text: Every time I pop into quickly's I'm always walking out satisfied! I enjoy their Thai tea milk tea with boba! Oh and their egg waffle is so soft on the inside and crunchy on the outside! Don't pass up on this sweet spot at all! It's right down the road from the gym I go to so I always head here after for a sweet little cheat delight !

LSyaC0Po6fjWVWpG4FnUYw.text: Drinks: I have come here a few times and I have liked every drink I've received. I like the Taro, green tea, and strawberry. The boba is always soft and easy to chew. Overall great refreshing boba drinks are served here!   Service: Now this is why I gave 3 instead of 4 stars... The people are always nice and respectful however whenever I ask for extra boba, it's never extra boba which I pay extra for. So if you do like extra boba make sure to emphasize it a bit. Also I feel as if sometimes the cashiers don't understand me (nothing against their accent) however I don't want to waste their time and mine by making/receiving the wrong drink.   Inside Quickly: The interior is very clean and I like the colorful chairs and tables. The floor looks clean. And most importantly the area where they make the drinks look clean.   Price: Really depends on what size you order but it's reasonable. I order a medium which usually comes out to $4.50 plus tax. Which would make the large about $6.00 plus tax.   Wish I could have given them 4 stars, but I do an overall review of EVERYTHING. So because of the service issues I had to bring it down to 3. But the boba itself is great but I had so leave a honest warning as to how the service can be tricky.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Green Tea Boba Tea

IXEWezCokXsibcKn7F_Bqg.text: Came here one weekday afternoon. There were a few customers when I arrived, but the place wasn't busy. When it was my turn to order, the staff greeted me and answered all my questions. The lady was so nice!  I ordered the following: Nutella Mochi Waffle $7.99 Large Wintermelon with Agar & Pearls $4.75  Both items were made to order. I waited 10 minutes or less for a soft, warm nutella mochi waffle and refreshingly sweet wintermelon milk tea! I was going to save half of my waffle for the hubs buuuttttt what had happened was... it was too good to share! I wish this place was close to me, I would probably go at least once a week!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Nutella Mochi Waffle $7.99 and large Wintermelon with agar and pearls $4.75
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Large Wintermelon Milk Tea with udon agar and pearls $4.75

XjqSD96ktJFedA8Ygk_5OQ.text: I randomly came across this place when I lived in the apartments right next to it. I haven't been here in more than a year and I finally visited again a few weeks ago. There's so many additonal things on the menu! There's a dessert menu that wasn't there before and more snacks. They also have a very extensive flavor menu to choose from and 4 different ways you want the drink. You can also add up to 3 different toppings in the drink.  I've tried the fried oreos which just came fresh out of the fryer and absolutely delicious. Their drinks are okay but the flavor is a little more toned down than Fruiticup hence me taking off one star. However I still think this place is much better than Fruiticup. Highly recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fried oreos with the chocolate hazelnut milk tea

dUzNqd5J428pAZHjvZBm2w.text: In for the first time today, it's clean, staff was helpful. I ordered a super hazelnut milk tea and i asked for it extra sweet so the guy let me try it first to make sure it was sweet enough- Hello Customer Service . I order the teriyaki chicken which was great. I can wait to come back and try everything.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

q8bN7FqMU0B_gF_fwZT4eQ.text: I love this place! My favorite place to go! I usually order a rose milk tea, Nutella mochi waffles, spam musubi, sometimes chicken poppers and calamari, and they're always amazing! Their drinks and snacks are the best! The owner even remembers my usual order, which is so sweet! The atmosphere is cute! This place makes me happy

4ONSliNBWWsi4XPzyiuGCA.text: Upon revisiting during open business hours I find the place quite nice.  Very friendly service and great recommendations.  Delicious bubble tea, as good as NYC or L.A. ! Great food.

LHLHkK_miWIZ1LzKeWswxg.text: their boba milk tea is life changing. seriously if you haven't been before you have to try it, i truly didn't know what i was missing!! and the cashier was so sweet and helpful :') 10/10 recommend the milk tea with taro and tapioca

9D5nm0_pnndltJUUmNkFqw.text: So this may be a little exaggeration but Quickly is like the Willy Wonka factory of Bubble Tea.I've never been somewhere with so many flavors of Bubble Tea.To top it off,you get to choose your flavor of tapioca balls and how you want the ice shaved .I ordered a mango strawberry snow bubble tea with passion fruit boba.It was soooo good.I'll be back again..and again..and thennn again!!! Lol!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

nlJW7SZnlVTiYOby5U9czA.text: Cute little place we got our drinks Quickly haha (please give me a coupon). I like the chubby size this is me and my anime queen thx guys.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

cSLVjRnL_ug8LLE6QIS-YA.text: This place is beyond great! Amazing service, owner is so sweet, the prices are reasonable, and the drinks exceed my expectations. They have soooo many choices on their menu! It's fun to try different flavors & they let you mix flavors! It shows that they strive to make all of their customers happy. I would give 10 stars if I could! Thanks Quickly

4fs5FOQoCpL4EqgWj-jbWg.text: This was my first boba tea, and I was excited.  The place was immaculately kept.  I noticed an impressive 97.0 sanitation score.  The woman behind the counter was helpful and patient.  Truthfully though, it was hard to understand everything she said due to her accent.    After she carefully went over the different options I settled on a small pineapple/coconut boba.  The tea was amazingly cold and delightfully refreshing.  Not too sweet...  A unique taste that I loved.   I liked that each tea was made fresh to order, and the way they sealed the top of the cup so no spills!  The wide straws were novel and just right for consuming this drink.  The first few sips were great, until it just wasn't anymore.    There were so, so many boba that it interfered with the enjoyment of the drink.  At one point the boba seemed to be replicating itself.    With each sip this experience morphed into a high-end drink nightmare!  The boba tasted like chewy pebbles of goo that expanded in my stomach.   It caused my stomach to ache.  I began discarding the boba into a napkin until I finally gave up and tossed the entire drink out.  I didn't even have 1/3 of it.  I felt wasteful but really...  No treat should be this much work!    Five dollars directly in the trash.   Will I ever drink boba again?   There is a probability. Will I request less or NO boba?   Certainly.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Nice lady, a bit of a language barrier.
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. She suggested I try these egg puffs.  Glad that I didn&#39;t.

u44nQXpRNGPHtYCe05LtYQ.text: Stopped by for a quick snack with my daughter. No surprise that my daughter ordered the honeydew bubble tea. Although they have 30+ options. We got it made as "snow" which calls for a creamier texture that I loved. Their boba was the perfect consistency and I'm usually not a fan of the boba. I ordered the mochi green tea waffle. It was so good. Crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

SG4J2JmnK64MSWDw7hMM1A.text: Quickly is the best Bubble Tea Shop in the area. They have the best service and staff. The menu is very extensive, and constantly growing. It seems that there's always something new every time I go in. All their drinks are superb and all their food is extremely delicious. The place looks immaculately clean too. If you haven't, give this place a try, you can't go wrong.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Earl Grey Milk Tea
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. Egg Puff Ice Cream

i4lqSqlh-azluJvTmeu9iA.text: My daughter bought me home a coconut bubble tea. I'm not a fan.l have a had better from Tea Fusion( which is hands down the best I have tasted in Charlotte.. as far)

MHXlX8wx6WrWJQYcLcefVg.text: Let me Quickly tell you what I thought of this place.  So it's a chain, and there are a lot of them in the Mid Atlantic and down south apparently. My first experience of a Quickly, wasn't great. It's the one in the NE burbs of Charlotte, and the service was definitely the best part. I got a black milk tea with tapioca, and the pearls didn't taste like anything (just plastic) and the tea was very bland too, and a litte watery. I was disappointed because I hate to say it, but chains usually know how to make a good milk tea. In any case, I'll try other locations in the future, and it wasn't awful. Just not up to my standards.

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States. After all these bubble teas, I can no longer move Quickly

hEgRZxEL7Toiusyq3YZJMw.text: Out of the three boba tea places in the University area, this is my favorite. The owners are very kind. Also, they have the best taro milk tea in Charlotte. My girlfriend and I never get tired of getting it. Despite that, they have a massive selection of milk tea flavors, as well as have an expansive food menu. As far as I know, this is the only place in Charlotte that offers mochi waffles. Highly recommended.

wS5btUxipc_92j6nYuYggA.text: Great staff and delicious food and bubble drinks! Also the fried Tofu is excellent choice!

K74cLyUYwkiE24TUYNpViQ.text: My favorite thing to get is the mango snow, super with boba. It's the best bubble tea in the QC as far as consistency and flavor. The bobas are  always perfectly soft and chewy. The snow consistency is so fluffy and almost creamy, I love it! If you haven't tried it yet, your missing out!

photos.caption: Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Quickly Bubble Tea - Charlotte, NC, United States

_-JSn6eU5QGu9ivkiNtclg.text: My favorite place for bubble tea by far. Much better than the other reviewed places. So many choices of flavor and texture and size! My daughter gets mango snow with rainbow jelly and I like Matcha green tea with honey boba among a lot of other flavors. Good snacks too and really nice people who work there. Mochi waffle is amazing. We keep coming back for egg puff and calamari or popcorn chicken with a spicy batter. You get it in a paper bag and eat it with a little stick. They are so friendly and everything is always yummy.
